dmca.title: DMCA NOTIFICATION; 1ST FOLLOW UP; www.yonextennis.com / Head
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Stephany Santos [mailto:stephany@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Friday, May 26, 2006 4:39 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA NOTIFICATION; 1ST FOLLOW UP; www.yonextennis.com /
Head Racquets 
Subject: DMCA NOTIFICATION; 1ST FOLLOW UP; www.yonextennis.com / Head
Racquets 



 

 

 To whom it may concern,

 

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you
regarding your client  www.yonextennis.com <http://www.yonextennis.com/>


 and our client Head Racquets. Your client recived a DMCA Notiification
informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and
trademarked logos. They received this letter on 4/28/06and was given
eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am
showing your client has yet to comply. This notice was also sent to you
on 4/28/06 please find these letters attached and please provide me with
a follow-up on this by 5/30/06. If you have any questions please do not
hesitate to contact me via email at (stephany@netenforcers.com
<mailto:stephany@netenforcers.com> ).

 

 

 

Stephany Santos
Letter Management
Net Enforcers, Enforcement Team
stephany@netenforcers.com <mailto:misha@netenforcers.com>  
compliance.management@netenforcers.com
<mailto:compliance.management@netenforcers.com> 

The Online Enforcement Experts...... 

Statement of Confidentiality

The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.



--Attached--

 

April 28, 2006
SENT VIA CERTIFIED MAIL
  RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED	7005 3110 0000 6653 7640


San Diego Badminton Supply 
PO Box 232494
Encinitas, CA 92023


Re:	Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property 
Dear Sir or Madam:
This letter is to provide notice of unauthorized use of intellectual property owned or licensed by Head USA and its affiliates (
